column5: Hi all:  For those of you interested in seeing a bit of what MNRF (Ministry of Natural Resources and Forestry) does, the public is invited to see the Ontario Explorer, the flagship of the MNRF's Lake Ontario Management Unit in Port Credit on Saturday July 19, 2014. The event is from 10 - 3pm at Port Credit Marina, next to the Snug Harbour Restaurant. Admission is free.  Some stats:  Jon
Sounds cool, but we'll be camping this weekend. I've posted that on my facebook page, thanks for the info!
